summary: This module implements lightweight mock representations of AWS Organizations components—accounts, delegated administrators, organization, organizational units, policies, roots, and service access—along with a backend that stores and manages these entities, enabling creation, description, closure, and policy handling in a simulated environment.
business_intent: To provide a fully functional fake AWS Organizations service within the Moto library so developers can test and develop code that interacts with Organizations APIs locally without requiring real AWS resources.
